ygData.subject: Re: E'ci server want to learn languages
ygData.msgSnippet: I am on also on Eci server im very good in old erudian i would be happy to teach u I need someone to teach me Elder tierdal combine dragon tongue Athorn The
ygData.messageBody:
I am on also on Eci server im very good in old erudian i would be happy to
teach u I need someone to teach me Elder tierdal combine dragon tongue

Athorn The Guadrian

----- Original Message -----
From: Golbez <golbez01@...>
To: <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Sent: 11 maja 1999 23:14
Subject: [EQ_spell_research] E'ci server want to learn languages


> From: "Golbez" <golbez01@...>
>
> Hail and well met all. I'm a level 18 Necromancer of the E'ci server
> interested in learning a bunch of languages. Mostly old erudian but
> anything is welcome. I have a couple pages of Tasarin's Grimoire to trade
> but smithing has taken all my other spare money.
>
> Perhaps many of us could gather in the Tunnel of Ro or somewhere everyone
> can be and practice languages for a while.
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> ONElist: where real people with real interests get connected.
> http://www.onelist.com
> Join a new list today!
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> This list is intended for the trade of Spell components for spell
research. Please keep the emails on topic.
